name: Games People Play: Hearts, Spades, and Euchre
summary: Classic card games remade by the masters of strategy, Westwood Studios. Play over the internet in tournaments, on a network with friends, or against the computer AI. Customizable rule sets, card themes, and table backgrounds. Hearts, Spades, and Euchre fun for the whole family.
